text: Yes companies have phone number and call activities, so you should be thinking about adding this feature, and might be a option to select - `if want to make call on company number of select from the associated contacts of the company`
Hey <@U2H3TT8F2> <@U7SL518D6> --- we've got an unpublished blog post that is absolutely refusing to remove itself from a blog listing -- but the item itself is leading to a 404
do you know what capabilities HubSpot can offer for viewing logs of the accessed files? for instance on our website since we run the server, I can grab the request logs from the log files.
I believe this API might be what you are looking for: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/cms/content-audit>
Hi <@U01DS3J1NR5>, this isn’t possible. It’s all pages with the HubSpot tracking code on them.
